title: Interdisciplinary Project-Based Language Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of fundamental job-related concepts
context.additional_context: Environment enabling real-time collaboration using personal mobile devices, conducting projects that link language domains with job competencies (science/media, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners can integrate topics from various academic disciplines to generate three or more job-specific language expressions
Learners can collaborate with peers using mobile tools to produce integrated subject project outcomes
Learners can correct language usage errors by over 80% based on real-time feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
